name: ABLAZE!!!
description: SET THE WORLD ON FIRE!!

name: Stairs appears
description: Stairs appears, HAHA!!!

name: House go boom!
description: HAHA!!!

name: Herb Stun
description: Herb stuns you

name: Pain Relief
description: Herb relieves your pain!

name: Mild Curing Herb healing
description: Mild healing thanks to the Mild Curing Herb
message: You consume the herb and your wounds are slightly healed up!

name: Medium Curing Herb healing
description: Medium healing thanks to the Medium Curing Herb
message: You consume the herb and you feel well-healed to a certain extent!

name: Strong Curing Herb healing
description: Strong healing thanks to the Strong Curing Herb
message: You consume the herb and you feel very well healed!

name: Secret teleport
description: Teleports the user to an attuned gate.
message: You teleport to the attuned gate!

name: Stop
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster stops by the target.'

name: Boulder Throw
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster strikes the weakpoint, applying stunned effect for 3 turns.'

name: Charge!
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster gains momentum, increasing movement speed, hit chance and impact damage as it takes effect.'

name: Charge
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sprints toward the target. This is casted randomly between 15 to 25 times.'

name: Violent Writhe
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'After an accurate slash, caster's bladed tendril becomes wilder in motion, randomly slicing through the air that deals cutting damage to all affected targets.'

description:
